name: Heroes Wanted
description:
Recruit heroes and defeat the monsters!
Newbies will be always welcomed.


You must select the most optimal set of cards for each round.
The damage multipliers increase depending on the combination of cards' elements and types.
Plan your next move wisely while considering every possibility.


Build Your Perfect Deck:
Cards that have been given as rewards have their own unique skills.
Plan how it might synergize with other artifacts and cards and defeat the monsters!

Choose Wisely:
You must choose the most optimal set of cards during every turn.
Each turn you must consider the item, artifact, card combination, elements, and skills you possess.
Sometimes betting against the odds might be your only option.


Unpredictable Events:
Depending on the events you triggered and which artifacts you chose, there will be no same playthroughs.
However, be warned, fate might not be on your side.


The Early Access provides the following contents:
- 2 Playable characters both with unique skills
- NNN Number of cards
- NN Number of Artifacts
- NN Number of events
- NN Number of items
